# ENTITY::SET_ALLOW_MIGRATE_TO_SPECTATOR

## Parameters
* **ENTITY_INDEX** entity
* **BOOL** ignoreCanAccept

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Set Ignore CanAcceptControl flag on physical entity

p1 is always set to 1
